## SimStoreBaseState.totalRedistributed property

Total collateral and debt per stake that has been liquidated through redistribution.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
totalRedistributed: Trove;
```

## Remarks

Needed when dealing with instances of [TroveWithPendingRedistribution](./lib-base.trovewithpendingredistribution.md)<!-- -->.
